pullrequest.title: Resolution option functionality for semi-supervised mode

content.raw:
The conditional `supervision_data is not None` is the same as below. The only thing different is the case where `resolution > 1`. Also both conditional also share `int_blocks.append(supervision_data)`. There should only be one conditional between these two and one special conditional for modifying `supervision_data` in the case where `resolution > 1`.

The conditional itself should have no `\` and be fully contained in 1 set of parenthesis. But in the case where the conditional will only have 1 line no parenthesis should be needed.
content.html:
The conditional supervision_data is not None is the same as below. The only thing different is the case where resolution > 1. Also both conditional also share int_blocks.append(supervision_data). There should only be one conditional between these two and one special conditional for modifying supervision_data in the case where resolution > 1.

The conditional itself should have no \ and be fully contained in 1 set of parenthesis. But in the case where the conditional will only have 1 line no parenthesis should be needed.
